Returns: The @B_android#support#v4#view#LayoutInflaterFactory_E@ associated with the @B_android#view#LayoutInflater_E@. Will be null if the inflater does not have a @B_android#support#v4#view#LayoutInflaterFactory_E@ but a raw @B_android#view#LayoutInflater#Factory_E@.
getFactory(android.view.LayoutInflater).Description: Use @B_android#support#v4#view#LayoutInflaterCompat#setFactory2_E@ to set and @B_android#view#LayoutInflater#getFactory2_E@ to get the factory. Return the current @B_android#support#v4#view#LayoutInflaterFactory_E@ (or null). This is called on each element name. If the factory returns a View, add that to the hierarchy. If it returns null, proceed to call onCreateView(name).
